question: Here are some different political and social actions that people can take. Please indicate, for each type of action, whether: you have done this in the past year, you have done this in the more distant past, you have not done this but might do it or you have not done this and would never, under any circumstances, do it. f. encouraged other people to take action on a political or social issue that is important to you ONLINE
options: Have done in the past year
Have done in the more distant past
Have not done, but might do
Have not done and would never do
raw_output:
I believe encouraging others online is an effective way to raise awareness and motivate collective action, so I have done this in the past year to support causes I care about and to amplify important messages. This aligns with my belief in the power of social networks to influence change. 

ANSWER: A
